song.title: Open Your Mind
song.info:
basehead/fm/kosmic hey kids... hope you enjoy this houz/tranz/breakbeat or whatever you want to call it track... =) i spent quite a bit of time on it and perharps i got carried away so sorry if it all doesn't go completely together... well like i said, enjoy it... this track is for the musicdisk with stalker/fm and myself... i wanted to throw in something harder to show everyone that i'm not all mellow and jazzy all the time =) thanx to necros, because he sent me like a 5 pattern song on which this entire track based... plus he gave me a bunch of the samples... other samples are from "open your mind" by 3Phase (cd), and also from Dr;Alban's "it's my life (euromix)" (cd), pitty/dytec's "longing for techno 2" mod, dune/orange's tune from the x-y-z demo, and last but not least... "sax it up" by saxmachine (cd)...
werdwerdwerdwerdwerdwerd...
peace-out!
-bh-june 26-1995- -btw, this song has NO resemblence to 3phase's "open your mind" ar all, except for the vocal.-
